---
title: "Uncompressed HDF5 + Improvements"
output: html_document
---

```{r, setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
if(packageVersion('rhdf5') == "2.23.0") {
    devtools::install_github(repo = "grimbough/rhdf5", ref = "5e1f0be", quiet = TRUE, force = TRUE)
}
if(packageVersion('DelayedArray') != "0.5.1.1") {
    devtools::install_github(repo = "grimbough/DelayedArray", ref = "d61695b",  quiet = TRUE, force = TRUE)
}
```

```{r, load-libs, message=FALSE}
library(TENxBrainData)
library(microbenchmark)
options(DelayedArray.block.size=2e9)
```

```{r, load-data}
tenx.uncmp <- HDF5Array(file = '/media/Storage/Work/TENxBenchmarking/tenx_uncompressed.h5', 
                        name = "counts")
tenx.sub.uncmp <- tenx.uncmp[,1:13000]
```

```{r, save-results}
system.time(res5 <- colSums(tenx.sub.uncmp))
save(res5, file = "/media/Storage/Work/TENxBenchmarking/res5.rda")
```

```{r, uncompressed-tweaks}
bm5 <- microbenchmark(colSums(tenx.sub.uncmp),
                      times = 5L, unit = "s",
                      control = list(order = "block", warmup = 0))
bm5$expr <- "DelayedArray+\nrhdf5+\nuncompressed"
save(bm5, file = "/media/Storage/Work/TENxBenchmarking/bm5.rda")
bm5
```
